p:testcaseDefinition.p:name: EID_SERVER_B2_1_01_ECDSA
p:testcaseDefinition.p:description: Positive test verifying the eID-Server to support all algorithms and parameters listed in the ICS for verification of XML signatures during communication using the SAML-Profile.
p:testcaseDefinition.p:clientExplanation: Configure the server to accept the certificate chain for client E. This includes the TLS, XML signature and the CV certificate.
